title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 8800.4 - Agency participation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 8800.4 - Agency participation

State Regulations

The agency whose action is the subject of a petition for an
advisory opinion shall be given a full opportunity in accordance with the
provisions of sections 8800.5 and
8800.6
of this Part to submit
pertinent information and arguments to the office. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
8800.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
